name: Baies Candle
description: The tangy coolness of freshly picked blackcurrant berries. A few black bunches still have their leaves, their green and aromatic scent blending with the lively, flowery accents of rose. 190g candle

name: No. 9 Blackberry And Vanilla Musk Eau De Parfum
description: Irresistible and playful, this spicy-sweet, warm scent combines juicy blackberry buds, rich vanilla and sensuous velvet musk with white rose and cashmere woods.

name: Holiday Candle
description: Enjoy the quintessential aroma of the holiday season with this bestselling candle designed with notes of citrus, pine, and amber.

name: Wood Sage & Sea Salt Cologne
description: Winner of Best Cult Fragrance at the Glamour Beauty Power List 2019.

name: White Maple Bourbon Candle
description: Smooth bourbon envelopes accents of white maple wood and precious vanilla bean, reminding you of quiet evenings curled up by the fire.

name: Advent Calendar
description: 25-piece set featuring special treats for skin, face, and body during the holiday season.

name: Stone Essential Oil Diffuser
description: Delight your senses with this gorgeous diffuser that doubles as décor.

name: Essentials Kit
description: vitruvi's 4 most popular essential oils: calming Lavender, invigorating Eucalyptus, refreshing Spruce, and energizing Grapefruit. They blend so well together, while also being very versatile on their own—making this a great choice for newcomers and longtime oil-lovers alike.

name: Holiday Cheer Luxury Candle
description: Mandarin orange, fresh woods and pomegranate luxury scented candle.

name: 11 11 Eau de Parfum
description: Thrill the senses with this beautifully airy blend of white musk and amber.
gift: 0.5 fl oz 11 11 Eau De Parfum Purse Spray
offer: Free with any $100+ Lake & Skye purchase

name: Chai Milk Candle
description: Like a perfect steaming hot chai latte on a chilly fall day. Coconut soy wax candle.

name: Scents of Joy Eau de Parfum Trio
description: Featuring a trio of equally exquisite scents, the Scents of Joy 5ml Eau de Parfum Trio is the perfect way to sample Sana Jardin and take your favourite aroma with you on-the-go.

name: Grapefruit Reed Diffuser
description: Carefully crafted with the highest quality fragrance oils, NEST Reed Diffusers are designed to continuously fill your home with a lush, memorable fragrance.

name: Salt Eau de Parfum
description: Salty skin, the creamy heat of the sun and a whiff of tropical florals, SALT is sensual, complex and soul-healing.

name: Discovery Kit
description: Vilhelm Parfumerie's most sought after scents for your discovery
